title: UPDATED FURNISHED 2/2 NEW LAMINATE FLOOR . FRESHLY PAINTED

Ad is for OWNERS only, no agents!', 'I am in great need of a cheap small Studio preferably in the basement to move in immediately in Staten Island very close to Brooklyn.', 'I am without a home right now and want to find a landlord who is understanding and will let me move in right away and let me start paying rent on the third month.', 'Email me if you have anything available.', 'My names Liam.', 'I’m currently living in the Vermont area and am looking for a room to rent.', 'I’m a producer so I AM LOUD.', 'If you’re fine with listening to 808 bass all night let me know.', 'Other than that I’m pretty chill, laid back, I’ve been sober for three years.', 'I’m clean and keep my areas clean.', 'Text me eight o two eight eght one nin four nin svenIM NOT INTERESTED IN TRADING FOR ROOM.I am looking for an apartment, for 2 people.', 'Large 1 bedroom or 2 bedroom apt.', 'Brooklyn or Queens.', 'Many renters think they don’t have enough money to buy a house when in reality if you’re paying around $800 a month for rent, then you may be able to qualify for a mortgage and buy a home.', 'Owning a home has so many benefits, one of them being a monthly payment goes towards something valuable and you gain equity in your home.', 'When you are renting your money isn’t benefiting you at all it’s only making your landlord richer.', 'If you are considering purchasing a home please feel free to contact me.', 'I will be glad to help walk you through the home buying process.', 'We, 4 New York University NYU girl students from India on budget, are looking for a residence.', 'The duration is preferably for two years starting August 15th.', 'We are looking for a safe neighborhood, with no more than a thirty minute commute to the Washington Square Park campus of NYU.', 'We would ideally like 4 rooms, one for each of us.', 'However, 3 room apartments are acceptable if the living room can be converted in to a bedroom by installing a flex wall.', 'We would also prefer laundry to be in the unit or building.', 'Co-signors are available.', 'Our budget is no more than 1300$ per person.', 'Please contact if available.', "Client's lease ends in SEPTEMBER-", "We must find 2BR/2BA, doorman bldg, NO CAT, W/D a must- up to $8500We've exhausted open listings and currently on market- Seeking off market or unlisted options please.hi my name is Carmen , I'm looking for a two bedroom single family home.", "I have section 8 which covers $1,200 a month, have a two month security deposit available , looking for a home my husband and my daughter and my self .We've lived in the same house for the end of August around Ulster County.', 'I am: reliable, efficient, intelligent, resilient, and trustworthy.', 'No drugs, non-smoker, and quiet.', 'Respect privacy.', 'Easy to get along with; TOTAL!", 'Lot Size Approx 310,605 sf (lots combined)Zoning PSR2Take this opportunity to build your dream estate with gorgeous panoramic canyon & city views in the desirable Pasadena area near Annandale Golf Club!', 'Surrounded by multi-million dollar homes!', 'Please see directions to drive by.', 'There are no utilities on the lot.', 'No reports or survey.', "Lots like this don't last long in this market!", 'Buyer to verify all information and rely on their own investigations.', 'Drive by and MAKE OFFER.Directions: From Glen Oaks Blvd to Wierfield Dr. Lots are between Glen Oaks Blvd & Bushwich Dr.EASY SHOWINGS **', 'BEST VIEW **', 'Located in the Highly Sought-After Oak Hill Estates, This Home is Centrally Located - 15 Minutes to Downtown LA and Pasadena, Adjacent to Highland Park and South Pasadena.', 'The Home has a Formal Living Room, 19 feet - HIGH CEILING Dining Area with a SPRAWLING GORGEOUS 6 RING Chandelier, & Family Entertainment Room with a Beautiful Kitchen, Center Island, & a Breakfast Area.', 'French Doors Off the Breakfast Area Lead to Open Panoramic View of The City & Lucious Green Trees.', 'The Kitchen & Family Room have Access to the Backyard/Patio with Newly Installed Sail Canopy for Your Backyard Enjoyment.', 'The Downstairs Also has a Den/Office(or can be a 5th Bedroom) plus Guest Powder-room & Direct Access to the Garage.', 'The Upstairs has Four Bedrooms & Two Bathrooms Including a Spectacular Master Suite & Large Walk-in Closet.', 'The Guest Bathroom Upstairs has Double Sinks & a Door Separating the Shower/Toilet, & Sinks.', 'The Master Bedroom & Bathroom Have Views of the Mountains & Also the City.', 'The Second Floor Also has a Separate & Spacious Laundry Room with a Large Sink with Cabinets on Both Sides of the Walls.', 'Custom Accent Wall colorings & Stylish Accent Wallpapers, Granite Countertops.', 'Oversized Master Bedroom Suite with Large Bath with Soaking Tub, Stall Shower, Large Walk-In Closet.', 'Two Balconies & Dual Paned Windows.', 'Great location near downtown LA.', 'Move-in Ready & A MUST SEE!!', 'EASY SHOWINGSRare opportunity to own a Single Family Home with a Additional Dwelling Unit (ADU), Live in ONE AND RENT THE OTHER.', 'Front House offers a 2 Bedroom 1 Bath…ADU has a 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom.', 'Close to Downtown Baldwin Park..Shopping Centers, Markets, and Churches. \'\'\'\'\' BEACH\'\'\'\'\'\'"']
